EmailTemplate.description: Use to promote the benefits of web over audio for upsell
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet - Audio Upsell
EmailTemplate.subject: Wish web meetings were simpler?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
http://www.pgi.com
YOU CAN HAVE IT ALL NOW THERE'S A BETTER WAY TO COLLABORATE
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
What if you could combine the mobility of your audio calls with the benefits of web collaboration? Now you can – with GlobalMeet.
With GlobalMeet you get access to:
- Personal URL with no guest downloads - No need for dial-in numbers or passcodes – GlobalMeet calls you - Mobile apps for meetings on-the-go - Host controls from computer, tablet or mobile device Whether it's a large-scale training, ad hoc meeting for day-to-day collaboration or customer presentations and webinars, GlobalMeet gives you the ability to increase productivity and experience more effective meetings without losing the ease of audio calls.
WANT TO LEARN MORE? I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have or even provide you with an online demo. Contact me now to schedule your GlobalMeet demo.
Thank you,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Email}
{!User.Phone}
http://www.pgi.com
